duties.1: Decentralized App and auction system development and integration with ImmutableX collections and smart contracts
duties.2: Working with Moralis and Firebase cloud functions and databases
duties.3: Implementation of a new homepage, handling custom events on company applications and websites
duties.4: Cross-team collaboration for consistent user experience with product

projects.title: PORTFOLIO PAGE
projects.technologies: Next.js • TypeScript • TailwindCSS • React Three Fiber/Three.js • Blender
projects.description: Remaster of my deprecated React portfolio page. Now it's based on Next.js with TailwindCSS and TypeScript. Some parts of WebGL scene are GLTF models made in Blender and converted to React Three Fiber JSX components for better operating. Now features built-in web version of resume.

projects.title: POLONEZ AUTODRIVE
projects.description: Simple Three.js scene made with 3D Studio Max 2019. Models with animations were exported to .fbx files and baked into Synthwave/80's vibe 'coloring book' like animation with built-in GUI to play with scene colors and models. Turn on some music and have fun with coloring!

projects.title: YET ANOTHER WEATHER APP
projects.technologies: React • JavaScript • Sass • Vanta.js • OpenWeather API
projects.description: Another 'weather application', but with a breath of fresh air. Weather informations are displayed for the selected city or by geolocation of the user, and the interface has been enriched with additional possibilities to interact with displayed weather data and background. Unfortunately, still desktop only.
